title: Which are successful actor-director duo in Bollywood? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ajay Devgn-Rohit ShettyRanveer Singh-Sanjay Leela BhansaliSalman Khan-Kabir KhanKartik Aaryan-Luv RanjanRanbir Kapoor-Ayan MukherjiHritik Roshan-Rakesh RoshanNawazuddin Siddiqui-Anurag KashyapAkshay Kumar-Neeraj PandeyDeepika Padukone-Sanjay Leela BhansaliShah Rukh Khan-Karan JoharAamir Khan-Rajkumar HiraniGovinda-David DhawanThats all I know
